Utilities

If you are experiencing financial hardships during COVID-19, below are resources to contact:

Billing Assistance Information

Community Action of Victoria

     Phone: 361-575-0478

     Fax: 361-578-0062

     Email: yolandalozano@cacv.us

     Note: You can also visit their website at www.cacv.us for more information.

LAMB

     Phone: 361-798-9111

     Times: 9am – 1pm 

Help us go paperless! Paperless Billing Form

To make a utility billing payment online, please follow this link to the City’s online payment webpage.

CONTACTS

Cliff Riddle – Utility Billing Specialist 

Phone: 361- 798-3681

ELECTRICITY

Utility bills are due and payable on the 10th day of each month unless the 10th day falls on any city or postal holiday or weekend. Then the due day will be extended to the next open business day. Failure to make timely payment shall result in a 10% penalty or minimum charge of $5.00. 

WATER/SEWER

If a customer needs water cut-off at meter, the customer must contact City of Hallettsville Utilities at City Hall, 361-798-3681 or Public Works at 361-798-2201.  

2024 Consumer Confidence Report

Updated LSLI Notice November 2024 – PDF This is for customers that have been previously notified that they have Galvanized Requiring Replacement water lines.

SOLID WASTE

SERVICE DAYS

TDS – Waste Wizard (Sign up for notifications and schedule) –  (View)

Residential service days: Thursday (garbage), Every other Monday (recycling) Click here for the 2025 Recycling Schedule.

Commercial service days: Varies, please call for more information specific to your address. 

There is no service on Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, or New Year’s Day. 

TRANSFER STATION

The transfer station is located at 804 CR 201, Hallettsville, TX 77964

Hours of Operation: Monday, 8 A.M. – 4 P.M., Wednesday & Saturday, 8 A.M. – 12 P.M.

NEW UTILITY CUSTOMERS

If you are a new utility customer, download and complete the appropriate application. You can then submit the application via mail, fax, or email.

New Residential Customer Application Packet (PDF)

New Commericial Customer Application (PDF)

ELECTRIC UTILITY LOAD SHED

If you are a new or current customer and you are a Critical Care or Chronic Condition customer please read the following information.
PUCT Critical Loads 25.497 (PDF)

Load Shed Letter (PDF)
Utilities Special Needs Form (PDF)
